channel.title: Adding new armour problem
channel.description:
Hey people of mopar.
I have customs in my server, they're all working fine, no problems! But.. When i try to add some, sometimes my client freezes when i try to spawn them.
Example: i just added those: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/256956-rel-chaotic-melee-weapons-rel.html
Gzipped, models added, And after tried to spawn... Didn't even see them for a second, client crashes.. Happens with alot of things i'm adding.. How can i fix this?
I'm on a Delta 317.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Adding new armour problem
item.dc:creator: @langkampo langkampo
item.description:
